channel.title: Logout after 20 secs
channel.description: how to add this timer that it would be only possible to logout after 20 after doing anything exept walking?

i want it for everything like you can log out when do dont open any shops or dont trade any one for 20 secs then you can log out

item.title: Logout after 20 secs
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

I’m guessing you only want it for combat?

I don’t know? Something like

if (p.incombat = true) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p,“You can’t logout during combat!”);

Something like that I think? that would go in you log out method I’m pretty sure…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 05:17:29 am[/size][hr]Edit: ‘incombat’ was just a made up one I did, you wud replace it with whatever yours is.

Read full topic
